TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TreeView extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件在树结构(其中的项可以展开和折叠)中显示分层数据。

span.span: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，这意味着它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 下图显示了一个简单。The following illustration shows a simple . ![TreeView 图](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 图")![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") 内容都控件可以包含丰富的内容，如和控件。The contents of a are controls that can contain rich content, such as and controls. 一个可以包含一个或多个对象作为其后代。A can contain one or more objects as its descendants. 一个定义的层次结构为对象。A is defined as a hierarchy of objects. 一个可以通过绑定到数据源并使用填充其树对象。A can populate its tree by binding to a data source and using objects. 数据源的示例包括和对象。Examples of data sources include and objects. 显示大量的项会导致性能问题。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 请参阅[优化性能： 控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)有关详细信息。See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md) for more information. 若要提高的性能，请参阅[如何： 提高 TreeView 的性能](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview.md)。To improve the performance of a , see [How to: Improve the Performance of a TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview.md). 有关详细信息控件，请参阅[TreeView 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md)。For more information about the control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md). 一个具有有限的数量的级别。A has a limited number of levels. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## 自定义树视图控件Customizing the TreeView Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[TreeView 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 。The following example shows how to create a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件数据的参数`e`提供了包含和一个。The event data that the parameter `e` provides contains an and a . 设置为之前选择，或设置为项`null`如果没有以前选定的项。The is set to the item that was previously selected, or is set to `null` if there is no previously selected item. 同样，设置为新选定的项，或者设置为`null`如果未不选择任何新项。Similarly, the is set to the newly selected item, or is set to `null` if no new item is selected.

summary.span: 获取由 的 指定的属性的值。

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定用于确定值的属性的路径属性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 例如，假定绑定到类型的对象的集合`Employee`，其中包含两个属性调用`EmployeeName`和`EnployeeNumber`。For example, assume that a is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`. 可以使用若要显示的值`EmployeeName`中并设置到`"EmployeeNumber"`具有返回的值`EmployeeNumber`。You can use a to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the and set to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have return the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 属性是只读的属性。The property is a read-only property. 若要更改中选定项的值，使用属性来访问。To change the value of a selected item in a , use the property to access the . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示，它使用以显示`EmployeeName`并`EmployeeWorkDay`的属性`Employee`，并设置属性设置为`EmployeeNumber`。The following example shows a that uses a to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the property to the `EmployeeNumber`. 当选择`EmployeeName`中，则设置为`EmployeeNumber`。When you select an `EmployeeName` in the , the is set to the `EmployeeNumber`. [!code-xaml[TreeViewSelectedValue#SelectedValuePath](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TreeViewSelectedValue/CS/Window1.xaml#selectedvaluepath)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定用于确定值的属性的路径属性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 例如，假定绑定到类型的对象的集合`Employee`，其中包含两个属性调用`EmployeeName`和`EnployeeNumber`。For example, assume that a is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`. 可以使用若要显示的值`EmployeeName`中并设置到`"EmployeeNumber"`具有返回的值`EmployeeNumber`。You can use a to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the and set to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have return the value of `EmployeeNumber`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示，它使用以显示`EmployeeName`并`EmployeeWorkDay`的属性`Employee`，并设置属性设置为`EmployeeNumber`。The following example shows a that uses a to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the property to the `EmployeeNumber`. 当选择`EmployeeName`中，则设置为`EmployeeNumber`。When you select an `EmployeeName` in the , the is set to the `EmployeeNumber`.
